original_text: And he took the calf the people had made and burned it in the fire; then he ground it to powder, scattered it on the water and made the Israelites drink it.
korean_text: 모세가 그들이 만든 송아지를 가져다가 불살라 부수어 가루를 만들어 물에 뿌려 이스라엘 자손에게 마시게 하니라

sentences.original_text: And he took the calf the people had made
and burned it in the fire
then he ground it to powder
and made the Israelites drink it
